newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Grain, soybean markets quiet.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Grain, soybean markets quiet.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf corn, wheat and soybean markets were quiet late Friday with few basis changes from Thursday, grain dealers said.
Shipping delays on the Illinois River continued to slow movement of grain and soybeans to the U.S. Gulf. Some dealers said the delays prompted them to withdraw first-half March offers on soybeans.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
FH March unq + H nc +37 + K unc
LH March unq + H nc +35 + K unc
FH April unq + K unc +27 + K dn 1
LH April unq + K nc +26 + K unc
May unq + K nc +26 + K unc
June unq + K nc +26 + N nc
Note: H=CBOT March, K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, nc=no comparison.

Note H=CBOT March, K=CBOT May, nc=no comparison

((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
